subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Vijay Singh took over the top spot in the race for the FedEx Cup on Sunday when he beat Sergio García in the Barclays with a birdie on the second hole of sudden death.
snippet: Vijay Singh took over the top spot in the race for the FedEx Cup on Sunday when he beat Sergio García in the Barclays with a birdie on the second hole of sudden death.
